TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityChangeTracker

summary.span: 定義物件服務用來追蹤對物件屬性所做變更的功能。

span.span: Defines the facilities that are used by Object Services to track changes that are made to the properties of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 是 Entity Data Model 工具所產生之實體 (Entity) 類型和複雜類型的基底類別 (Base Class)。 and are the base classes for entity types and complex types generated by the Entity Data Model tools. 這兩個基底類別都會使用 來報告屬性變更。Both base classes use to report property changes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)並[追蹤 POCO 實體變更](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: public void EntityComplexMemberChanged (string entityMemberName, object complexObject, string complexObjectMemberName);

param.name: entityMemberName
param.span: 已變更之實體型別的複雜屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the complex property of the entity type that has changed.

param.name: complexObject
param.span: 包含已變更之屬性的複雜型別。

span.span: The complex type that contains the property that changed.

param.name: complexObjectMemberName
param.span: 針對複雜型別變更之屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the property that changed on complex type.

summary.span: 通知變更追蹤程式，複雜型別中的屬性已經改變。

span.span: Notifies the change tracker that a property of a complex type has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 來報告屬性已變更。 is used by to report that a property has changed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)並[追蹤 POCO 實體變更](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

span.span: Notifies the change tracker of a pending change to a complex property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 會使用 來報告複雜屬性變更中。 is used by and to report that a complex property is changing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)並[追蹤 POCO 實體變更](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 來報告屬性即將變更。 is used by to report that a property is changing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)並[追蹤 POCO 實體變更](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).
